title: Minecraft 1.7.9 Linux Cracked TeamExtreme
description:
<a href="http://bayimg.com/kAngDaaFo" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://bayimg.com/kAngDaaFo</a>

Minecraft v1.7.9 for Linux - Using TeamExtreme Launcher [Unofficial Release]
Tested on OpenSuse and Fedora. - Should work on any linux distro, the only requirement is that you have java installed.

According to Minecraft's Official site Oracle JVM is preferred over openJDK, please check your distro's knowledge base to known more about how to change to Oracle JVM (if you aren't already running it).
 
No installation needed, just follow this instructions:
1 - Copy the downloaded folder to you home folder.
2 - You will find "Minecraft.desktop" inside the folder, this is the shortcut from which you can start the game, copy it to your desktop. (you can freely rename this shortcut to whatever you want)
3 - RENAME the "minecraft" folder to ".minecraft", this will make the folder hidden which is the default.

ENJOY, COMMENT AND SEED!
